metadata.title: CVE-2021-43537 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An incorrect type conversion of sizes from 64bit to 32bit integers allowed an attacker to corrupt memory leading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.4.0, Firefox ESR < 91.4.0, and Firefox < 95.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '95.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
